column5: Hello and welcome to Dallas! I can't wait to have you stay in my clean well kept home with my two cats! My house is a 3 bedroom, 2 bath single family home and is only 10 minutes away from Downtown Dallas and only 5 minutes away from White Rock Lake! Explore, hike, dine, go kayaking, or just stay in and enjoy premium cable on large screen TVs/wetbar or take it easy in the pool and heated spa! Walking in the door in my home is like being on vacation , and I like to keep the vibe that way!
column8: Private Suite in House w/Pool 10-mins to downtown!
